about_the_game:
Rediscover the modernist movement of the 60s with this pack made by REV0. The MCM aesthetic provides you with a new way to customize your city, including the classic 1-story homes, road-side restaurants and hotels.

Mid-Century Modern is a Content Creator pack of a whopping 147 residential growable buildings for your own unique city. Are you ready for your next stylish suburban area?

The pack also includes:
- District style for growables
- 3 Hotels and 2 restaurants
- 30+ additional decorations such as fences, furniture, and yard decorations
- Car Ports
detailed_description:
Rediscover the modernist movement of the 60s with this pack made by REV0. The MCM aesthetic provides you with a new way to customize your city, including the classic 1-story homes, road-side restaurants and hotels.

Mid-Century Modern is a Content Creator pack of a whopping 147 residential growable buildings for your own unique city. Are you ready for your next stylish suburban area?

The pack also includes:
- District style for growables
- 3 Hotels and 2 restaurants
- 30+ additional decorations such as fences, furniture, and yard decorations
- Car Ports

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 5670, 512 MB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz or AMD FX-6300, 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 930 | AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTS 450 (1 GB) | AMD® R7 250 (2 GB) | Intel Iris Xe G7 (Tiger Lake)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 2700K | AMD® Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 580 (1.5 GB) | AMD® Radeon™ RX 560 (4 GB)
